name: Monster Cuisine
description:
Monster Cuisine is a first-person restaurant management game. The player is on the frontier of an unexplored land, teeming with monsters. They employ monster hunters to track, kill, and harvest monsters in the many regions of the lands for their meat and other body parts along with regional spices and other ingredients. The player then crafts delicious food that they can sell to customers for gold and to a food critic which promotes, The Hungry Hunter Restaurant. Many of these interactions are through done through UI and the 3D world.

The hunts will be very risky as some of your hunters can die during the expedition, so construct the team that you think can tackle the region using our 3 different classes.

Watch the Trailer for a basic run-down on the gameplay loop.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact with objects (Map, Hunter Board, Cooking Stations)

Tab - Open Inventory

Inventory Controls:

Drag with mouse to move ingredients in the Inventory

Drag + Shift = Half Stack

Drag + Ctrl = Take one from the stack

Drag Ingredient or Dish out of UI to spawn 3D model

Hold E on an item to pick up or store item in Inventory again

IMPORTANT INFORMATION:

The Herbalist must be included on your team to receive Regional Ingredients. Otherwise, you will only receive Monster Parts from your expeditions. Regional Ingredients are required for both Recipes.
